forward
Class ForwardDbConnection

java.lang.Object
  forward.ForwardDbConnection

public class ForwardDbConnection
extends java.lang.Object

ForwardDbConnection This classe implements all necessary for connecting to DBMS Are managed different kind of data base, with ODBC connection or with the standard Java JConnector.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Giampietro Zedda
